basics.name: P. Roberts
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information and Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Managed and coordinated communications planning and execution of telecommunications and information technology across a department spanning five companies, ensuring seamless integration and operational efficiency.
highlights: Communications section manager with 14+ years of planning and executing the installation, operationm and maintenance of communications systems, including local are networks, wide are networks, and routers; satellite radio communications; electronic support systems; and network integration using radio, wire, and automated systems.

work.summary: Help Desk Technician provided technical support and assistance to clients, including the U.S. Army Pacific Commanding General, throughout the Pacific and European regions
highlights: Help Desk Technician provided techincal support and assitance to clients, including U.S. Army Pacific Commanding General and supporting workforce, throughout the Pacific and European regions

work.summary: Radio technician with expertise ranging from novice tasks of troubleshooting to advanced system integration, providing support throughout the Republic of South Korea, Texas, U.S.A., and Germany.
highlights: Installed, maintained, and troubleshooted signal support systems, computer systems, signal communications support electronic equipment, and satellite radio communications equipment.
